00040  * This flag needs to be set to following values  
00041  *   1: Display Debug messages, 
00042  *   0: No Display of Debug messages 
00043  */
00044 
00045 /* This definition is for integer */
00046 #define INT_BITS                        8
00047 #define SHORT_INT_BITS              4
00048 #define BYTE_BITS                   2
00049 
00050 /* This definition is for double */
00051 #define DOUBLE_EXPONENT_BITS            12
00052 #define DOUBLE_MANTISSA_BITS            52
00053 #define DOUBLE_BITS                     64
00054 #define DOUBLE_HEXA_BITS                16
00055 #define DOUBLE_CONSTANT                 1023
00056 
00057 /* This definition is for float */
00058 #define FLOAT_EXPONENT_BITS             9
00059 #define FLOAT_MANTISSA_BITS             32
00060 #define FLOAT_HEXA_BITS                 8
00061 #define FLOAT_CONSTANT                  127
00062 
00063 /* This definition is for unsigned Integer */
00064 #define U_INT_MAXCOUNT_4                4
00065 #define U_SHORT_INT_MAXCOUNT_2          2
00066 #define U_SHORT_INT_MAXCOUNT_1          1
00067 #define HYPER_MAX_100                   100
00068 #define HYPER_MAXCOUNT_16               16
00069 #define HYPER_BITS                      16

00080 int getWriteDoubleHexFromDouble(char hexa[DOUBLE_HEXA_BITS], double d);
